about_the_game:
Blessed Surface features an all original soundtrack by Composer/Producer Travis Kirby. It fuses a charming video game style with the rhythmic approach of hip-hop, resulting in a wonderfully mellow and soothing experience. Suitable for relaxing, gaming, studying, and more. Let it take you on a comfy adventure!

Includes 14 tracks in .wav format.
Soundtrack will be downloaded to Steam\steamapps\common\Blessed Surface\Blessed Surface - OST

Track List:

  • 1 Sunrise
  • 2 Springtide
  • 3 Ancient Lullaby
  • 4 Pellicule of Life
  • 5 Aquatic Malfunctions
  • 6 Ascent
  • 7 Litany of Corrosion
  • 8 Eternity Chained
  • 9 Spring's Return
  • 10 Forsaken Remains
  • 11 Descent
  • 12 Fever Dreams
  • 13 The Battle Within
  • 14 Sunset
